scripts.start: docker container prune -f && docker compose up --build
scripts.e2e: docker container prune -f && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --exit-code-from e2e
scripts.build_prod_and_start: docker container prune -f && docker compose -f docker-compose.build.prod.yml up --build
scripts.e2e_backend: docker container prune -f && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e_backend.yml up --build --exit-code-from e2e_backend
